title: Cyclone approaching
creator_credit: Cecil Holmes, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: Indicates the counter-disaster operations initiated by the civil defence organizations and the simple safety procedures which should be followed by the community in general. Uses Cyclone Tracy as an example and includes graphic scenes depicting the type of devastation that cyclones can produce.
